summary: One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.
cast: Billy Crystal|Daniel Stern|Jon Lovitz|Jack Palance|Patricia Wettig|Pruitt Taylor Vince|Bill McKinney|Lindsay Crystal|Beth Grant|Noble Willingham|David Paymer|Josh Mostel|Jayne Meadows|Alan Charof|Kenneth S. Allen|Jennifer Crystal Foley|Molly McClure|Helen Siff|Irmise Brown|Bill McIntosh|Mario Roberts|Lesley Boone|Bob Balaban|Kevin Cooper|Craig Hurley|Kent Kasper|Darrell Mapson
keywords: gold|treasure|sequel|male bonding|older brother younger brother relationship
title: El tesoro de Curly
